assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the institutional research boards and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.
